EmailTemplate.name: CSO - Quotes Research Required (Ticket Closure)
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. Your ticket tracking number for this inquiry is provided above. Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. Your ticket tracking number for this inquiry is provided above.
Quote requested for P/N __<p/n entered by agent>___________
Unfortunately, after multiple requests for additional information we did not receive the data necessary to support your request for quote. The subject ticket and request are now closed. If you still require a quotation for the subject item, please submit a new request and include the information listed below to assist in the completion of your request.
Cage Code: _________________________________________. Next Higher Assembly P/N : ____________________________. End Item P/N: _______________________________________. Component Maintenance Manual: _______________________. Aircraft Model: ______________________________________.
For your convenience and faster service, please visit our MyAerospace Web Portal at http://www.MyAerospace.com to request a quote, place an order, get order status, make order changes, authorize a return, and much more. Thank you, we appreciate your business!
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com
Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time
